metadata.title: CVE-2024-0727 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Processing a maliciously formatted PKCS12 file may lead OpenSSL to crashleading to a potential Denial of Service attack

criterions.comment: openssl package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
edk2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
